column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Similar to the croissant
column2: but this time with two sticks of dark chocolate in the croissant. If you thought the croissant is large and fluffy
column3: this one and the Almond croissant
column4: grab two and it's the size of my head. The chocolate was right. Not too sweet. I'm sure they used Valrhona chocolate as they had it for their mochas and hot chocolate. Though I feel the proportion feels off. Part of me wants to crumple that croissant so that it would be denser
